website_summaries.verdict: The brush could be a little better, but the formula  enhances the length and color of lashes and makes mascara go on smoothly for rich, buildable color.
pros: High-performance gel tints, defines, and primes eyelashes
Also adds a touch of natural color that makes it practical to wear by itself
cons: The applicator brush is flimsy, which makes application somewhat awkward
A few complaints of irritation from use

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To for Natural (But Way Better) Eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is less a primer and more a daytime mascara. I'm blond(ish), so I find that the tint emphasizes and defines my lashes with a natural look that fits my lifestyle (over 40, working mom). BUT if I do get to take my lashes out at the end of the day, I can add a black mascara on top and get a dramatic evening look. Just a fabulous product, especially if you are fair and don't want to look like you have false eyelashes on at a 9am meeting or playdate.
customer_reviews.author: Basura Blanca

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Doesn’t Irritate my 👀! Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love Benefit “They’re Real” TINTED PRIMER. My eyes are very sensitive to almost every mascara. Yes even the ones that say “SENSITIVE”. I’m freckled, very fair, blonde hair, blonde eye lashes. This gives my lashes color & I can do layers. Then use my lash curler. ABSOLUTELY NO EYE IRRITATION!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Vegan Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great color, easy to apply with flexible wand
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand mascara in black before, and it does give very full lashes. Tried this primer for the brown color and because reviewers stated it gave a more natural look. I love using it alone without mascara on top. The brown shade works much better with my complexion, and it gives a light enough coating to make my lashes pop, without looking like I even have anything on my lashes. I also love the flexible wand, so easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin and hair. Most mascara I’ve tried is too heavy for my tastes. I use this as a stand alone with no additional mascara. It holds up pretty well for a primer and gives me a more natural look for my lashes, which are red. My eyes are somewhat sensitive but I’ve never had any trouble. I bought a travel size to try before investing in the full size. There does seem to be a difference between the wand brushes. The travel size has a slightly more compact wand head which I liked better.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a strawberry blonde with blonde eyelashes. My lashes are plenty long but I like to darken them, but heavy dark mascaras don't look natural on me. I tried this as soon as I received and am very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: raffaella

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: There is not a better primer--you can wear it alone and it looks great. But, wear it under the "They're Real Mascara." I use the primer, then apply the mascara--one coat is all you need. Women ask me all the time where I go to get my lashes done. It is certainly worth the price--I will never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Cata

customer_reviews.title: Very natural
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara! Others I have tried were too clumpy and unnatural looking. I was looking just for color, not thickness or extra length. This brings out my natural fair lashes, which seem to look longer than with ordinary mascaras. I was not a fan of the spiky end on the applicator, and couldn’t figure out the intention of that design. It just made it less precise, so I just trimmed those bristles. This is more than twice as much as I have ever paid for mascara, but I like the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Dale in RI

customer_reviews.title: Look how long my eyelashes are!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara primer! You can put it on before your favorite mascara and it will make your eyelashes very long. You can also use it without mascara for a more natural look. It doesn't flake or run.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Pinsky

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: These do nothing for my short curly lashes. I bought it because it was recommended for anti-smudge and ant-raccoon eye. Lies. Not only did it do nothing to lengthen and volumize my lashes, this product smudged by the end of the work day I was total raccoon style. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Pearring

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I am an aging blonde and my eyelashes are very long but not noticiable. I have looked everywhere for a "tint" type of mascara that does clump, smear, or make eyelashes look like spider legs. Finally found it. This product takes only a few swipes and puts a more natural color without looking like mascara. I love it. I will never be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural Looking Lashes But Better
customer_reviews.text: This lash primer is like mascara, but not as thick. I use it alone on days when I want to look more natural. It darkens and lengthens lashes. Looks great! It lasts as long as mascara and doesn’t rub off. It isn’t waterproof but I don’t always need waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: "Raven"

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the natural look you can get from this - I definitely don't recommend using it as a primer, but just use it as your mascara. I wonder if it makes my eyes sting a little when I wash it off cause everytime I do it leaves my eyes stinging a little. Otherwise love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not able to continue use, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I have fair completion, blonde eyelashes, and generally don’t experience sensitivity to mascaras or primers I’ve tried in the past. This product caused eye irritation for me. If you don’t experience that issue, you will likely be pleased, as the tint is pretty and it’s effective as a base primer. I experienced slight irritation during the day when I first used. Second wear, I made the mistake of not removing completely before bed- I woke up looking like I had double pink eye! If you experience even the slightest irritation, be sure to remove product completely before going to bed, otherwise the irritation might be magnified!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Send new and not reused. Yuk!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this before at Nordstrom. So I thought. Ok I can’t really go there and instead I bought here through prime. Bad idea. 1st pump. I saw a couple stringy things and I.seriously laughed and said that would be nasty if that’s was an eyelash. !! 🤮. It was. 🤭. that’s one thing you don’t share with your friends is make up! Holy dyna a stranger is worse. 6ft people cmon. That’s really gross. I’m gonna start videoing my pkgs I think. 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Old/dried up quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this colored primer for lashes. But, it didn’t take no time and I had trouble getting any out of the tube. It was like it dried up or possibly was old. Of course, the sellers wouldn’t be able to know that.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Trolinger

customer_reviews.title: Great primer, but it caused irritation for me
customer_reviews.text: Great primer, but it caused irritation for me. I have very sensitive eyes (my eyes get red and burn with most mascaras, makeup removers, etc), so if that's you, I wouldn't recommend. I cleaned brush and gave to my sister who loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Better than globby mascara and more natural looking.
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all day, does not flake and washes off very easily with gentle facial cleanser and water. The product is pricey but worth it. I do wish it came in black though.
customer_reviews.author: Weedpuller

customer_reviews.title: Product is good, wand is not
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn't clump or glob. Very nice primer coat. I use the brown for a pimer, then just a touch of regular black mascara on the uppers for a natural look. Holds well and resists smudging. It would be a 5 star all the way, except that the applicator wand is very cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Colton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Can't Go Without It!
customer_reviews.text: Can't go without this stuff. It lengthens my lashes and helps my mascara go on more smoothly. I use this every day. Great brand and great product!
customer_reviews.author: E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have discovered this product! I'm in my late 30's with natural red hair and full but near-invisible lashes, so most mascara is too much. I stopped wearing mascara for quite a long time, as it was really irritating to my eyes and aggravated my allergies. But this product has been right about perfect!! Not too heavy, non-scented, lightweight, and just the right amount of color as not to look overdone or just plain bad. I have finally found a product that I've been looking for! Thanks, Benefit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Goes on evenly.
customer_reviews.text: This primer goes on evenly. Seems to help regular mascara go on better, & remove easier. Sometimes I don't cover with "real" mascara.
customer_reviews.author: countrygal

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I wear it alone for casual. I use it as primer when I'm going out. LOVE Benefits products, the mascara is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kim E.

customer_reviews.title: It helps define your lashes and also grips your mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about one year and it really helps, especially since my lashes have thinned over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this is the best thing I have found to accentuate my eyebrows which have thinned over time and are harder to see. This and the brow pencil are an absolute for me now
customer_reviews.author: Cinemares

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth with no clumps and mink is a nice color.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a no clump mascara. very much like Great Lash. I'm liking this color! I can always add black over if I feel like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Adams 'Sally'

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer!
customer_reviews.text: This primer is like using a mild mascara. It thickens and lengthens without being stiff. It can be worn with or without mascara. I used to buy this from Sephora but they no longer carry it. A win for me because it was a bit less expensive from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Add a little color and length
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Adds a little color and length and goes on smoothly (not clumpy) I could not apply the other Real mascara products without them clumping and looking a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eyes
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced & no added value to the less expensive brands I’ve used. Would not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: notash

customer_reviews.title: Great for the fair haired
customer_reviews.text: Easy to remove, doesn’t flake, and the perfect shade for those with blond hair and lashes. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: It works. Not as dark as I would have liked. But ok.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It has one of those brushes that is super floppy. For whatever reason I've never liked that ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't make my lashes look much different than using mascara alone. I got very little increase in length, and absolutely no volume boost. If anything my lashes looked thinner than using just mascara. It has one of those brushes that is super floppy. For whatever reason I've never liked that type of applicator. I find it hard to get close to the roots of my lashes if the brush is just flopping around. Though I know many people love that applicator style. Looks like I'll be sticking with my Diorshow primer for now...though it keeps getting more and more difficult to find :(
customer_reviews.author: R. Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product almost not smudging, I use it both as primer or mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Covers well
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey. Works well. Have to see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: Not water prove
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really like it , it’s not a water prove like it said !
customer_reviews.author: AVP

customer_reviews.title: It separates lashes...also easy to remove.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this primer does really work. I use it mainly by itself, there's no need for me to add mascara on top of it. I like the brown tinted instead of black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect for that in between time of having eyelash extensions and the removal of those extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Ellenhorn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but can find L’Oréal brand for the cost and does the same job
customer_reviews.author: KarRN

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer so much. Been using for years. Helps my tiny eyelashes look longer and fuller.
customer_reviews.author: mcro

customer_reviews.title: Glowy Eyes
customer_reviews.text: This tinted lash primer is super, just what I needed. You don't even have to use mascara with it. It's great for everyday use and simple. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: sunnyred

customer_reviews.title: It's tinted soft brown.
customer_reviews.text: This was a 2d order for this product. I didn't use it all in a year but replaced it anyway. I think it makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A. Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This primer is amazing - I use it everyday, but use it by itself on those days when I don't want to wear much makeup and go for a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Layer for stronger effect
customer_reviews.text: Good product that is easy to apply. Does not clump or flake off. Light coverage but can layer for stronger effect.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Key

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised on how nice and natural this looks.
customer_reviews.author: Terri from MD

customer_reviews.title: No need for mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This tinted primer looks great by itself. No need for mascara on top. The color is perfect for redheads.no
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wear contacts and have no issues love it more than mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Builds up thin lashes
customer_reviews.text: This mascara doesn't clump up as much as other mascaras. I also like the brush. I have thin lashes and it builds them up well.
customer_reviews.author: mrsmueller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found this product...it works great alone or adds thickness as a primer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pace

customer_reviews.title: Not a great primer or mascera. 6hr wait after applying??!!
customer_reviews.text: I love to use primer first on my eyelashes. When I saw this I was happy to see brown and the brand is great but it states on the box only that to apply regular mascera after the primer after 6 hours!! Who has that amount of time to wait. I tried it and waited a hour and by the time I put on my mascera my lashes went from separated to clumped. Benefit is a great product but this mascera is not. It doesn't work well as a primer at all. Maybe a regular mascera only but not that great kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far.  No mascara in pics
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far!! Second time using it... soft not flaky, looks natural. Havent had time to see about overall dying over time. This is no mascara... just the product on them. Beautiful color and no smudging. ❤
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Wand really separates lashes well.
customer_reviews.text: The brush/wand on this primer does a great job of separating lashes, and I use the unique tip for hard to get lashes so it works well on my deep-set eyes. It doesn’t get clumpy and helps my regular mascara stay on. You need makeup remover to get it off. Follow up: bristles broke off from wand stem which was my fault, but it is a very weak connection.
customer_reviews.author: Reed More

customer_reviews.title: Completely happy to shed my dependence on mascara!!
customer_reviews.text: I had already purchased the trial size of this product so I had confidence in the full size producing similar results. I was wrong, the full size is even better than I expected! This product allows me to skip mascara completely. I am over 50, but still have long eyelashes—I need help with “fuller lashes”. I love the flexibility this product offers.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyanne

customer_reviews.title: Great product to have around
customer_reviews.text: Since my eyelashes are virtually invisible (pale color), I wanted something besides mascara all the time. This fills the bill. Works great alone or under mascara.
customer_reviews.author: MsGibby

customer_reviews.title: A NICE CHANGE!
customer_reviews.text: After fighting with volumize, lengthening mascaras, this is a nice change. It is a lighter than most mascaras, but it does not clump or flake. The extra little brush at the end of the mascara brush easily separates lashes for a natural look.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST Lash Primer
customer_reviews.text: Having tried several primers before this one, I can honestly say I will never go back. It can be worn alone for a subtle/natural look or layered with your fave mascara. Definitely makes my lashes look more dense and long. It does take a little bit more effort to remove (I use jojoba oil on a cotton pad before cleansing my face.) but it is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ash M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Best primer and mascara I have used EVER! I’m 57 and have no lashes and this does the job. I finally have lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tyler

customer_reviews.title: can be used as a stand alone product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple years and I love the mink brown color. I use it without mascara on top for a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: misha C

customer_reviews.title: A good quality mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have used They're Real mascara - only black...However, I saw the Mink Brown color listed and am giving it a try...and I really like this color on my lashes as they are light in color. The black has alway been a bit harsh...and other browns did not work. Benefit They're Real is a good product, although more costly than other products.
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: This is the only eyelash primer I will ever Use!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyelash primer I will ever use! None of my eyelashes stick together it is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very versital
customer_reviews.text: this primer can easily be worn alone or as a base coat. Much better than the white primers that are on the market. It is my go to primer and I continue to buy this over and over
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna

customer_reviews.title: dry, flaky and hard to wash off
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a bad batch or if the primer is supposed to be dry. It was rather clumpy and flaky, and doesn't look natural. Also not easy to wash off. I decided not to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Moni Balhorn

customer_reviews.title: I love Benefit products
customer_reviews.text: Received exactly what I wanted. I have to travel an hour and a half to find a Benefit counter and it is hit and miss when I get there. When I ordered this mascara, I was very pleased. it was fresh and not clumpy. I would recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: The best mascara/primer I have ever used. I am a natural redhead and it works perfectly for me, a couple layers make my blonde eyelashes look brown, and a few more make them look luxurious and dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments, this the best mascara I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Draper

customer_reviews.title: My forever mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is all I need for mascara non-clumping natural brown color.
customer_reviews.author: Star 1

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I received the product the day after I ordered it. Love this primer
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clark

customer_reviews.title: I use this primer for a couple of years. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this primer for a couple of years. It comes in darker brown color only and works perfectly as mascara. Makes eyelashes long and separate them well.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Have used it for a couple of years now. I like to use it alone for a natural lash look. It does work very well as a primer as well when layered with mascara.
customer_reviews.author: BAB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and reordered this and it is my go-to mascara.It is expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I get the brown and use it instead of mascara. Love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie 1

customer_reviews.title: Nice subtle color that a gives my eyelashes definition but ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice subtle color that a gives my eyelashes definition but doesn't make me look like I am ready to do onstage. If I put it on in the morning, it starts looking a little limp by midday, which is why I didn't give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great alone or with mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This primer is great under the mascara or alone. Really lengthens your lashes and looks natural. My must have daily makeup along with tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Primer!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a long time! Perfect primer!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Zarzano

customer_reviews.title: Used product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was opened and taped back together on both ends. It appears that this is used. So gross. Sending back!
customer_reviews.author: kristen mccallum

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the primer to have more volume. Instead its very lightweight
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN

product_meta.title: Benefit They're Real Tinted Lash Primer, Mink Brown, 0.3 Ounce
product_meta.description: An innovative tinted eyelash primer. Features a water-resistant, high-performing gel formula. Helps color, define and prime lashes. Provides a mink brown shade. Dramatically increases length and separates for dramatic lashes. Infused with Pro-vitamin B5 to condition lashes. Boasts a custom ExtraFlex brush to move with lashes for ultimate separation. Creates feathery, natural looking lashes. Can be worn alone or under your favorite mascara.
feature_bullets: Features a water-resistant, high-performing gel formula
Helps color, define and prime lashes

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
